bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of kidney depletion cold of old people that is difficult to cure even by ingesting medications meant to supplement the kidneys. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry yang 羊 quotes Ji feng bei ji fang 雞峰備急方 : 老人腎硬：治老人腎臟虛寒，內腎結硬，雖服補藥不入 , “ Kidney hardness of old people: To cure depletion cold of an old person’s kidneys. When the internal kidneys are bound and have hardened, one may ingests kidney-supplementing medication - it will not be able to enter”.
